p: However, sibutramine is an appetite suppressant and works by means of low dietary intake [ 9]. However, antiobesity drugs are reported to cause severe side complications including insomnia, headache, dry mouth, constipation, high blood pressure and heart attack [ 10, 11]. Therefore, investigations into medicinal herbs or plants that possess antioxidant and antiobesity activity is becoming a subject of keen interest due to their natural origin, low cost and limited adverse effects [ 12, 13, 14].
